name: 4x4 Off Road: Race With Gate
description:
The game 4х4 Off Road : Race With Gate is a simulator of the rally off-road racing. For the player represented on the choice of route and machines. In the game there are opponents, which will make the game more dynamic and colorful.
The game has good graphics, and performance.
Realistic physics behavior of the machine.
The player can play the passage or choose free play mode that would hone their driving skills.
Each machine has physical properties that can be improved, that would be better.
There are two modes of play:
- First - is the mode with the capture of the gate, you have to chase opponents to win, sometimes the victory will not be easy.
- The second game mode is the capture and holding the flag.
For the victory you will be given compensation in the form of play money, for which you will be able to improve your car or buy a new one.
